content.html:
There's a few things in your process that could have made it easier on you once you were in the lab. scp is available on windows. I use the GUI Winscp <http://winscp.net/eng/index.php> and the command-line pscp from Putty. 

When sending the e-mail with a long link, enclose the URL with greater than and less than symbols. Most e-mail clients will make sure the url isn't broken up when the text wraps.

Jeremy
